remarks: Definition of the class projection corresponding to tagged tuples.  The expression ` ( A Proj B ) ` denotes the projection on the A^th component.  (Contributed by BJ, 6-Apr-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-bj-proj $p |- ( A Proj B ) = { x | { x } e. ( B " { A } ) } $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
